00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_XML_GRAMMAR_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif

00048 #include <string>
00049 
00050 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00051 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00052 
00053 // supress noise
00054 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1200)
00055 #  pragma warning (disable : 4786) // too long name, harmless warning
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 //#define BOOST_SPIRIT_DEBUG
00059 #include <boost/spirit/core/non_terminal/rule.hpp>
00060 
00061 // the following hack is to evade a bogus error generated by using the
00062 // word "arg" when bind.hpp has been included
00063 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1200)
00064 #define arg xarg
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 // spirit stuff
00068 #if (defined __BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ < 0x593) \
00069     || (defined _MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER <= 1300) 
00070 #include <boost/spirit/utility/chset.hpp>
00071 #else
00072 #include <boost/spirit/include/classic_chset.hpp>
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1200)
00076 #undef arg
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #include <boost/archive/basic_archive.hpp>
00080 #include <boost/serialization/tracking.hpp>
00081 #include <boost/serialization/version.hpp>
00082 
00083 namespace boost {
00084 namespace archive {
00085 
00087 // XML grammar parsing
00088 
00089 template<class CharType>
00090 class basic_xml_grammar {
00091 public:
00092     // The following is not necessary according to DR45, but at least
00093     // one compiler (Compaq C++ 6.5 in strict_ansi mode) chokes otherwise.
00094     struct return_values;
00095     friend struct return_values;
00096     
00097 private:
00098     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME std::basic_istream<CharType> IStream;
00099     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME std::basic_string<CharType> StringType;
00100     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::spirit::chset<CharType> chset_t;
00101     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::spirit::chlit<CharType> chlit_t;
00102     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::spirit::scanner<
00103         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME  std::basic_string<CharType>::iterator
00104     > scanner_t;
00105     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::spirit::rule<scanner_t> rule_t;
00106     // Start grammar definition
00107     rule_t    
00108         Reference,
00109         Eq, 
00110         STag,
00111         ETag,
00112         LetterOrUnderscoreOrColon,
00113         AttValue, 
00114         CharRef1, 
00115         CharRef2, 
00116         CharRef, 
00117         AmpRef,
00118         LTRef,
00119         GTRef,
00120         AposRef,
00121         QuoteRef,
00122         CharData,
00123         CharDataChars,
00124         content,
00125         AmpName,
00126         LTName,
00127         GTName,
00128         ClassNameChar,
00129         ClassName,
00130         Name,
00131         XMLDecl,
00132         XMLDeclChars,
00133         DocTypeDecl,
00134         DocTypeDeclChars,
00135         ClassIDAttribute,
00136         ObjectIDAttribute,
00137         ClassNameAttribute,
00138         TrackingAttribute,
00139         VersionAttribute,
00140         UnusedAttribute,
00141         Attribute,
00142         SignatureAttribute,
00143         SerializationWrapper,
00144         NameHead,
00145         NameTail,
00146         AttributeList,
00147         S;
00148 
00149     // XML Character classes
00150     chset_t
00151         BaseChar,
00152         Ideographic,
00153         Char, 
00154         Letter, 
00155         Digit,
00156         CombiningChar,
00157         Extender, 
00158         Sch,
00159         NameChar;
00160 
00161     void init_chset();
00162 
00163     bool my_parse(
00164         IStream & is,
00165         const rule_t &rule_, 
00166         const CharType delimiter = L'>'
00167     ) const ;
00168 public:
00169     struct return_values {
00170         StringType object_name;
00171         StringType contents;
00172         class_id_type class_id;
00173         object_id_type object_id;
00174         version_type version;
00175         tracking_type tracking_level;
00176         StringType class_name;
00177         return_values() :
00178             version(0),
00179             tracking_level(false)
00180         {}
00181     } rv;
00182     bool parse_start_tag(IStream & is) /*const*/;
00183     bool parse_end_tag(IStream & is) const;
00184     bool parse_string(IStream & is, StringType & s) /*const*/;
00185     void init(IStream & is);
00186     void windup(IStream & is);
00187     basic_xml_grammar();
00188 };
00189 
00190 } // namespace archive
00191 } // namespace boost
00192 
00193 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_XML_GRAMMAR_HPP
